name: Modules.BLE.Request
summary: A request that uses the Attribute Protocol (ATT).

parameters.name: value
parameters.summary: Titanium.Buffer object to update data on value

properties.name: characteristics
properties.summary: A list of characteristics discovered in this service.

properties.name: offset
properties.summary: The zero-based index of the first byte for the read or write.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: The data being read or written. Its a type of TiBuffer.
